Style 
=====

## Scoped Style Shim Rules
* :host ->  x-foo
* :host:hover ->  x-foo:hover
* :host[visible] ->  x-foo[visible]
* :host(.cssClass) ->  x-foo.cssClass
* :ancestor(.cssClass) -> .cssClass  x-foo
* :host-context(.cssClass) -> .cssClass  x-foo
* p ->  x-foo p
*  x-foo ->  x-foo
*  x-foo p ->  x-foo p
* ::content p ->  x-foo p
